name: Attack of The Peen Mobile
description:
The Peen are attacking the planet. Dodge alien tonsil stones, and fire Squiggle Rays at them to save the planet. These guys are dicks!

This game was made in a day by niock for fun. Now on Mobile! Enjoy.

Note: Wait for the Construct 3 logo to appear, then flip your phone to landscape for best results. Tap the screen at least once when the title screen appears to warm 'er up.

(Desktop version here: https://niock.itch.io/attack-of-the-peen)
